name: GMX - Login only 2013
css:
@namespace url(http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml);

/* ************************************************** */
/* Made by gotU                                       */
/* For nonprofit use only                             */
/* ************************************************** */

/* ************************************************** */
/* Clean the login page from unnecessary crap         */
/* Position the login field in the center             */
/* ************************************************** */

@-moz-document
url("http://www.gmx.net/"),
url("https://www.gmx.net/"),
url("http://www.gmx.net/?status=hinweis"),
url("http://www.gmx.net/?status=login-failed"),
url("https://www.gmx.net/?status=hinweis"),
url("https://www.gmx.net/?status=login-failed"),
url("http://www.gmx.de/"),
url("https://www.gmx.de/"),
url("http://www.gmx.at/"),
url("https://www.gmx.at/"),
url("http://www.gmx.at/?status=hinweis"),
url("http://www.gmx.at/?status=login-failed"),
url("https://www.gmx.at/?status=hinweis"),
url("https://www.gmx.at/?status=login-failed"),
url("http://www.gmx.ch/"),
url("https://www.gmx.ch/"),
url("http://www.gmx.ch/?status=hinweis"),
url("http://www.gmx.ch/?status=login-failed"),
url("https://www.gmx.ch/?status=hinweis"),
url("https://www.gmx.ch/?status=login-failed")

{

/*remove ads*/
IMG[src="//img.ui-portal.de/homepage/img/gmx/wm2014-winner.png"],
.service.lotto,
.teaser.news.news-l,
.teaser.news.multi-news,
.news-content,
.millionenklick,
.module-group,
#topper,
#mainnav,
.service.top-article,
.service.top-search,
.service.finanzen,
.service.icons,
#loginsearch-search,
#loginsearch-ad,
#rectangle-fallbackContent,
#omsFirst,
.sepLoginExpander,
#promoline,
.horoscope,
.subnavigation,
#footer,
#footer-sep-line,
#adFlashObject1,
#adFlashObject2,
#adBgRight,
#helplinks-help,
A[href="http://www.gmx.net/produkte/mail?mc=fm@hp@loginbox.fm"],
A[href="http://www.gmx.net/produkte/mail/?mc=fm@hp@loginbox.fm"],
A[href="https://www.gmx.net/produkte/mail/?mc=fm@hp@emailkostenlos.fm"],
.ad,
.hasIcon.icon-demail,
.hasIcon.icon-promail,
.hasIcon.icon-topmail
{ display: none !important; }


#loginsearch li.active{
margin-left: 29% !important;
}
.tab-contentPart.active{
margin-left: 30% !important;
}

#loginsearch
{ position: absolute !important; margin-top: 100px !important; }

}
